    • battleSpeedDecider

      public void battleSpeedDecider()
      Determines the battle speed modifier using the battle ground. If it is Plains battleSpeed = 0.5. Because, in plains the battle goes faster. So, speed modifier makes the duration half as long. If it is Marshlands battleSpeed = 2. Because, in marshlands the battle goes very slow as the soil is slippery. So, the modifier makes duration twice as long. If it is Mountains battleSpeed = 1.5. Because, in mountains the battle goes slow as positions are strong to take. So, duration becomes 1.5 times longer.

    • battleTimeAndWinnerCalculator

      public void battleTimeAndWinnerCalculator()
      Determines the winner and battle time. Each period, each army suffers casualities by their manpower and other's firepower. Each period is 10 hours. So, battle time increases 10 hours base each period. If one alliance hits below %20 of its manpower it retreats and others win. If they both hit below %20 at the same period they both retreat and there is no winner.

    • calculateBattleDay

      public void calculateBattleDay()
      Calculates battle duration of days by extraction 24 hours while battleHours is larger than 24 and incrementing battleDays.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString​(java.util.ArrayList<Army> alliance1, java.util.ArrayList<Army> alliance2)
      String representation of this battle.
